name: aaronspindler-css-optimization
description: CSS and JS optimization tools for aaronspindler.com

scripts.build:js: npm run minify:js && npm run compress:js
scripts.minify:js: terser static/js/base-optimized.js -o static/js/base-optimized.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/knowledge_graph.js -o static/js/knowledge_graph.min.js -c -m && terser static/js/search-autocomplete.js -o static/js/search-autocomplete.min.js -c -m && terser omas/static/omas/js/german-translations.js -o omas/static/omas/js/german-translations.min.js -c -m
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
